name: spd
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: syl5(w0, wal(s0, w1), w2, wex(s0, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wal(s0, w1), w2))
-| wi(wal(s0, w1), wex(s0, w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wex(s0, w2), w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wal(s0, w1), w2))
-| wi(wal(s0, w1), wex(s0, w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wex(s0, w2), w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wal(s0, w1), wex(s0, w2))
-| wex(s0, wi(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wal(s0, w1), w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wex(s0, w2), w2))
-| wex(s0, wi(w1, w2))

body.origin:
|- wex(s0, wi(w1, w2))
-| wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wal(s0, w1), w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wex(s0, w2), w2))
-| wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w1, w2))

|- wi(w0, wi(wal(s0, w1), w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wex(s0, w2), w2))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w1, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wi(w1, w2))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wal(s0, w1), w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wex(s0, w2), w2))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wex(s0, w2), w2))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wal(s0, w1), w2))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w1, w2))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s0, w2))

comment: Specialization deduction, using implicit substitution. Based on the proof of ~ spimed . (Contributed by Emmett Weisz, 17-Jan-2020.)
